Message:
I journeyed to the
People of the Sand’s territory
with our expedition team,
but got separated
on the way there.

Ugh...!
To think I’d run
into a member of
the People of the Sand
now of all times...!
But, she is just a kid...

“W-Wait!
If you just listen to what I—”

Just as I took
a step towards her,
an arrow pierced
the sand by my feet.

I-I guess the rumors are true,
after all...!

When I inspected further,
I realized that the arrow
had pierced a poisonous
variety of desert spider.
Did she just...save me...?

Lifting my head,
I saw the girl preparing to flee...

As she turned back,
our eyes met.
They were doe-like,
beautiful eyes—
the epitome of innocence.

“My name is Ayse...!
Thank you for saving me...!”

That was my first encounter
with my secret friend—
Liberia.
